mapper.select: select doc.id, doc.title, doc.body, doc.publish, doc.author, emp.name as authorName, doc.ts, emp.dept_name as deptName from doc left join ( select emp.id, emp.dept_id, dept.name dept_name, emp.name from emp left join dept ON emp.dept_id = dept.id ) emp on doc.author=emp.id
select d.id, d.title, d.body, if(d.publish=1,'true','false') as publish, d.author, e.name as authorName, d.ts from doc d left join emp e on d.author = e.id where d.id = #{id}

select z.lev1_dept, z.lev1_chief, e1.name lev1_name , z.lev2_dept, z.lev2_chief, e2.name lev2_name , z.lev3_dept, z.lev3_chief, e3.name lev3_name from( select t1.name as lev1_dept, t1.chief as lev1_chief , t2.name as lev2_dept, t2.chief as lev2_chief , t3.name as lev3_dept, t3.chief as lev3_chief from dept as t1 left join dept as t2 on t2.id = t1.up_id left join dept as t3 on t3.id = t2.up_id where t1.id = #{deptId} ) z left join emp e1 on z.lev1_chief=e1.id left join emp e2 on z.lev2_chief=e2.id left join emp e3 on z.lev3_chief=e3.id
